comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. In Activity onStart method try to use OpenStreetMapViewController.zoomToSpan() method What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Black screen and after few seconds ANR message What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? osmdroid-android-1.08 on Android 2.2 I'm using Google API 7 Please provide any additional information below. None.
I had the same problem. A solution for me was to call zoomToSpan in onWindowFocusChanged
